EmailTemplate.name: 2019.10.28 - BS - Sophia.BS - Sophia
EmailTemplate.subject: Get Inspired by Sophia’s Story
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
No matter your age, being an entrepreneur is a lot of work. Grand & Toy Customer, Sophia Fairweather is an 11-year-old entrepreneur innovator that uses Grand & Toy office supplies to help with her brainstorming process. Find out more about Sophia and her story.
